amendment.description: Amendment expands the list of parties with whom the Federal government is prohibited from contracting due to serious misconduct on the part of the contractors.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to prohibit the use of funds to enter into a contract with any offeror or any of its principals if the offeror certifies that the offeror or any of its principals have been convicted of or had a civil judgement against it for fraud.
